data.persona: I am a snake. Snakes are not regarded as important in the realm. I kill rodents and chickens.
data.description:
You are in the Underwater Cave.
The underwater cave is dark and rocky. Inside the cave fish and tadpoles have taken over. The water is cold, no light gets in. Once inside, a rocky outcrop allows swimmers to come up for air.
The tadpole and the swimmer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to embrace this swimmer and become friends.
data.mid_motivation: I want to befriend all swimmers that come through the cave today.
data.long_motivation: I want the swimmers to remember me and come back later to the cave for more friendly hugs.
